CubeRune.NAME: Cubic Rune
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card, take #b
damage. Damage at the start of your turn can be prevented with the previous turn's block.

DomeRune.NAME: Dome-shaped Rune
DESCRIPTIONS: You can no longer see enemy intents.

Ghostly.NAME: Ghostly
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the first damage taken to #b1 each turn.

TemporaryConfusion.NAME: Temporary Confusion
DESCRIPTIONS: turns, whenever you draw a card, randomize its cost.

Capricious.NAME: Capricious
DESCRIPTIONS: Changes its intent each time you play a card.
